snippet: Rafael Laureano, an unarmed man who charged at a knife-wielding suspect in a Brooklyn apartment, was hit inadvertently, the Police Department said.
abstract: Rafael Laureano dies from gunshot wound sustained after police opened fire when he attempted to charge a knife-wielding suspect in a Brooklyn apartment; had pushed his way past officers to confront the assailant, Francisco Carvajal, who also died in the shooting.
lead_paragraph: Rafael Laureano, an unarmed man who charged at a knife-wielding suspect in a Brooklyn apartment, was hit inadvertently, the Police Department said.

headline.main: Officers Fatally Shot Man Who Intervened in a Fight
headline.print_headline: Officers Fatally Shot Man Who Intervened in a Fight
